title: Preparation of imidazole-modified paper membrane for selective extraction of gallic acid and its structural and functional analogues from Pomegranate Peel
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14202-14213
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08576G, Paper
Open Access

Xiaoxue Sun, Jingyu Zhang, Xiaohui Han, Shumin Li, Xuerui Zhang, Xiaodong Bi
This work offers a novel approach to preparing a readily synthesized extraction membrane capable of isolating compounds with similar structures and pharmaceutical effects from natural products.
